replay:Chaotic.NAME: Chaotic
replay:Chaotic.DESCRIPTION: Start with the "Ring of Chaos" relic. Cards are scrambled by it more frequently.

replay:Library Looter.NAME: Library Looter
replay:Library Looter.DESCRIPTION: Each time you open a non-boss chest, choose 1 of 15 cards to obtain.
